response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we are confident it could be an unparalleled asset for you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $750,000. We believe this is a generous offer that reflects both the quality of the product and the opportunity it presents. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 750000}
